summary: Take possession of any interior in the game.
descriptionHtml:
This mod was mostly made for personal use and to aid roleplay.
It adds a spell to the game called Claim Interior that when cast inside an interior cell will make the caster the new owner of the cell.

Right now I have not added in a spell tome for it and so in order to get and use the spell you must do the following:

- Open the console and type "help claim" to get the ID of the Claim Interior spell.
- Type into the console "player.addspell xxxxxxx" with "xxxxxxx" replaced by the ID given from the help command.

After that the spell should be added to your spell book under Alteration. Since I made this spell mostly as a means of roleplaying moving into a fort, dungeon, or house that I like there is no mana cost for the spell.

Known Bugs:
- In testing I would sometimes have an odd chest left in a house that wouldn't become claimed after casting. Not sure what causes it but I just manually fixed it with the console by selecting the object and using "setownership".

This mod has not been thoroughly tested so you should use at your own risk. I'm not 100% at this point whether or not some cells will reset after casting, but I don't believe so. You might be best to store really valuable gear in somewhere that you KNOW to be safe.
author: RandomUser69
